description: Children returning to school are often from wealthier families, so why are other pupils staying home?
title: Coronavirus: Why reopening French schools is a social emergency
title_page: Coronavirus: Why reopening French schools is a social emergency - BBC News
maintext: "I was among the first parents who said 'no'. I can't allow myself to take this risk," she says. "At school, there are lots of pupils; you can't watch everyone or follow all of them, you can't let them out to play. So I'm against the idea."
